numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Many people from many countries say that the world is getting better.
2. No place in the world has an extremely low percentage.
5. I wonder why people with lower percentages think in that way.
6. I also wonder why people with higher percentages think in that way.
7. This relates to me and my community.
8. The US has one of the highest percentages of young adults who believe that the world is getting better.
9. This shows that the US is a positive country.
10. The headline is: The world is getting better day by day.
